vsParam:
Hee hee~ Look! I bought three loaves of
the limited bread in the school shop!

Ohhhh! Wistyria, good job!
Let's share them~

Yeah, sure! So, let me take a piece first
if you don't mind!

Oh~ Wistyria, you're already
one of the Academy now~

Hehe, good point.
[px], you feel assured now?

Hehe, that's really good.
Without your help, Wistyria can't fit in so quickly!

Hey— All of you—
I need your help...

The Head of Ruhuna Village told us that Goblins are ruining
their farmland, which bums him out... You know what I mean?

So, we need to drive all the Goblins away... Right?
Well, we can't turn a blind eye to it.

Yeah, that's what I mean!
Anyway, let's find out what's happening in Ruhuna Village first.

Oh, we're going out of the Academy!?
Count me in!

No, we're going to fight against monsters.
Wistyria, you need to stay here, understood?
